content: - 3 5mm hook or hook to get tight stitches with the yarn that you use - 2 75mm hook for nose and ears - 8 ply yarn -dk - some testers used ww - worsted weight - sewing needle - 7 5mm eyes or a size to give him that cute look - stuffing - embroidery cotton or yarn for mouth and nose - stitch markers - scrap bits of yarn
